posts.title: Remote Control Mini Drone
posts.content: Take flight anytime and anywhere you want no matter how cramped your surroundings, with the remote control mini drone. This pint sized drone features 3 levels of adjustable speed and can easily maneuver in small spaces making it ideal for indoor use.

posts.title: Self-Stabilizing Spoon
posts.content: Now those suffering from conditions that limit hand movement can chow down in peace using the self-stabilizing spoon. It features built-in sensors that detect and counteract hand tremors, and can be adapted with a fork and knife attachment.

posts.title: Glow In The Dark Beer Pong Set
posts.content: Turn a routine night of binge drinking into an epic alcohol chugging affair by playing with the glow in the dark beer pong set. The cups, balls, and table all feature a blindingly bright neon border that makes them glow for a clever way to play at night.

posts.title: The Decision Coin
posts.content: Leave all of your tough life choices up to fate by putting all your trust in the decision coin. This 1.5 inch diameter brass coin comes with “hell naw” engraved on one side and “f*ck yeah” engraved on the opposite side – so you never have to stress over another decision ever again.

posts.title: World’s Tiniest Violin
posts.content: Put an end to someone’s constant whining by making light of their complaints with the world’s tiniest violin. Whenever you hear incessant bellyaching coming from their pie hole, simply pull out your tiny instrument and serenade them until they shut up.

posts.title: Hot Wheels Rocket League Playset
posts.content: Experience all the thrilling action of a Rocket League game in real life by going head-to-head with your buddy using this Stadium playset from Hot Wheels. The set includes everything you’ll need to bring this exciting and fast-paced game to life.

posts.title: Emergency Snack Kit
posts.content: Ensure you’re prepared when hunger unexpectedly strikes by keeping this emergency snack kit close by. Intended for emergency snacking use only, this life-saving kit comes stuffed with everything from Doritos and Airheads to Cheetos and salted peanuts.

posts.title: Calculus For Infants
posts.content: Get your infant ahead of the curve from day one with Calculus for Infants. This amusing booklet will teach your child the introductory lessons of calculus – giving them a noticeable advantage that will easily last throughout their pre-kindergarten academic career.

posts.title: NERF Rival Prometheus MXVII-20K Blaster
posts.content: Gain an instant advantage over your opponents by walking into battle strapped with the NERF Rival Prometheus MXVII-20K blaster. It boasts an Advanced Acceleration System that lets you shoot up to 8 rounds per second!

posts.title: Pop-Up Book Of Sex
posts.content: Make more than just graphic images pop-up when you stimulate your libido with the pop-up book of sex. This fully illustrated literary gem contains page after page of 3-dimensional images to help you and your partner master the art of love making.

posts.title: Candy G-String
posts.content: Drive your partner wild by appealing to their sweet tooth with this delectable candy G-String. These sensual undies are made entirely out of little heart shaped multi-colored  hard candies perfect for spicing things up in the bedroom.

posts.title: AC Adapter Hidden Spy Camera
posts.content: Keep a watchful eye on babysitters, contractors, housekeepers, or just anyone who enters your home by discreetly recording them using this AC adapter hidden spy camera. This motion activated camera records 720×480 HD Video at 30 FPS using an SD card.
